title: 1.13的一些问题
author: 逍遥神候
txt_content:
1.13后
怎么让玩家控制一个方块移动...
就是玩家走到哪，方块跟到哪
5秒不动就变成实体方块动了就变成非实体可穿过的那种

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
你是想做躲猫猫吧，有点意思。

让玩家脚上有个掉落方块：
(高频执行)
execute as @a at @s unless entity @e[type=falling_block,distance=..1] run summon falling_block ~ ~ ~ {BlockState:{Name:"此处填写跟随玩家的方块的ID"},NoGravity:1b,Time:599}

建立计分版检测玩家运动：
(一次性执行)
scoreboard objectives add move minecraft.custom:minecraft.walkOneCm
scoreboard objectives add time dummy

以下命令高频按顺序执行：
execute as @a[scores={move=1..}] run scoreboard players set @s time 0
execute as @a[scores={move=..0}] run scoreboard players add @s time 1
scoreboard players set @a move 0
execute as @a[scores={time=100..}] at @s run setblock ~ ~1 ~ (玩家5秒不动后要放置的方块ID)
execute as @a[scores={time=..99}] at @s run setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:air
